downloadDescription: The poster provides a high-level and detailed view of BizTalk Server 2010 features and capabilities.
detailsSection: This poster lists the BizTalk Server 2010 capabilities bucketed in eight categories and is designed to enable technical discussions by providing both high-level and detailed views of the capabilities and features that are included. The poster has been updated to include new features and capabilities, including enhancements to RFID, BizTalk Adapter Pack, EDI, AS2, and better integration with Visual Studio and Windows Server. The poster is intended to be printed and measures 30.5”x28”.
installInstructionSection:
1. Before you click Download, you must configure the Adobe Reader to not open a PDF file in your browser. To do this:
    1. Open Adobe Reader.
    2. On the Edit menu, click Preferences.
    3. Under Categories, select Internet.
    4. Clear the Display PDF in browser option.
    5. Click OK.
    6. Close Adobe Reader.
  2. To start the download, click the Download button to start the download.

  3. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
